problems.title: Weak Suction / Motor sounds strained
problems.description: The vacuum turns on but barely picks up dirt.
solution_steps: Remove the VF110 filter and wash it with warm soapy water. It must be bone dry before reusing.
If the filter is old and gray, washing won't help. Replace it.

problems.title: Vacuum Not Charging
problems.description: No light when placed on the charging base.
solution_steps: Wipe the metal contacts on the vacuum and the base.
If the charger is lost or broken, you need a specific replacement base.
